attributes.action: Give children in public schools the same standard of education as private schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Standards of education in public schooling has dropped so much our children are leaving school with the education standards of a 10 year old.Yet our privately educated children are still of a very high standard?
I thought all children where equal and deserved the same whether rich or poor,a better standard of education may get this country back on its feet.
